data.text: @JohnCornyn “We the people” honest hard working tax payers want:  Less talk, Fewer hearings.  More action. Arrests, trials, prosecutions, money recovered. Not complicated. And PS:  Senate stay in session. SAVE, Budget, Codify Executive orders, Appointments Approved.
@JohnCornyn @SenJudiciaryGOP overspending and fraud are bipartisan issues

@JohnCornyn Sir. The amount of information required to qualify for these programs makes fraudulent collection of benefits laughable. The “fraud” in MN was done by contractors, not individuals. 
These posts are very embarrassing to you. I hope you get help soon.

@JohnCornyn @SenJudiciaryGOP Americans? IT : Importation Criminal Enforcement (ICE) for a Reason; the United States Constitution, the supreme Law, Article I Section 9 Clause 1 establish “The Migration or Importation of such Persons…” deals with this Matter. US States to pay a per Person Tax & a Fine;
@JohnCornyn @SenJudiciaryGOP Says the guy who would walk through hot coals barefoot to send billions of our tax dollars to Ukraine and israel. 🖕 you traitor.

@JohnCornyn @SenJudiciaryGOP Dear John 
You have voted for red flag laws, forever wars and foreign settlements all while enriching yourself at Texans expense. There are so many other times you stabbed Texas voters in the back. This Texan is voting for the other guy KP. Voter out.
